pkgmetadata.longdescription: FreeRADIUS Client is a framework and library for writing RADIUS Clients which additionally includes radlogin, a flexible RADIUS aware login replacement, a command line program to send RADIUS accounting records, a utility allowing to send RADIUS AAA requests from command line or from shell scripts and a utility to query the status of a (Merit) RADIUS server.
